column4: hey folks - I have a strange problem.  I have hardy installed on a macbook pro (rev2 - ati graphics card) and overtime my screen dims (even during use) until it finally blacks out.  I can use the brightness key to make it go back up but then it dims again.
oh i see its while your using it too
it happens very slowly over 10 to 15 min and it happens while I use it
